verbs.description: The rallies [V: are] reportedly expected to draw hundreds , far less than the crowds seen during the fiery Patriot Prayer pro - Trump rally and counter - protest on June 4 , 2017 .

The rallies are [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: expected] [C-ARG1: to draw hundreds , far less than the crowds seen during the fiery Patriot Prayer pro - Trump rally and counter - protest on June 4 , 2017] .

[ARG0: The rallies] are reportedly expected to [V: draw] [ARG1: hundreds] , [ARGM-ADV: far less than the crowds seen during the fiery Patriot Prayer pro - Trump rally and counter - protest on June 4 , 2017] .

The rallies are reportedly expected to draw hundreds , far less than [ARG1: the crowds] [V: seen] [ARGM-TMP: during the fiery Patriot Prayer pro - Trump rally and counter - protest on June 4 , 2017] .
